question: please interpret this dream
answer:
QUESTION
a while ago, i saw myself in a dream after fajr in which i was standing on something and giving adhan. the setting appeared to be saudia arabia. then, there was some sort of flood or something, and i was moved off of the stand, but i climbed back on, and started giving adhan again
ANSWER


Share:
The dream is an indication of you calling to righteous actions and deeds. In
doing so, you may encounter difficulties but that will not deter you from
your commitment. The dream may also infer something about Haj.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
FATWA DEPT.
